markdownRemark.html:
The DEFINITIVE guide to React and programming best practices.

JK. All code sucks in six months, so my philosophy is “write dumb code.” I’m looking out for future me who gets back into a component, reducer, util, or whatever after six months and has no idea what the hell is going on. Here are some patterns or guidelines I loosely follow nowadays. Of course, as new patterns or paradigms emerge, I’m willing to reevalute what I used to to consider best practice.

DRY is out, WET is in

Overabstraction is the bane of my existence. If I type something

Location, location, location
